statements: SELECT * FROM student_language_proficiency;
SELECT student_id, language FROM student_language_proficiency WHERE country_code = 'USA';
SELECT language, proficiency_level FROM student_language_proficiency WHERE country_code IN ('USA', 'CAN');
SELECT * FROM student_language_proficiency WHERE proficiency_level = 'Intermediate' ORDER BY language DESC;
SELECT student_id, proficiency_level FROM student_language_proficiency ORDER BY proficiency_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_language_proficiency ORDER BY country_code DESC, language ASC, proficiency_level ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT country_code, COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM student_language_proficiency GROUP BY country_code ORDER BY total_students DESC;
SELECT student_id, language, proficiency_level FROM student_language_proficiency WHERE proficiency_level = 'Advanced' AND country_code = 'USA';
SELECT DISTINCT language FROM student_language_proficiency WHERE country_code IN ('USA', 'UK', 'CAN') ORDER BY language;
SELECT * FROM student_language_proficiency WHERE country_code = 'USA' AND (language = 'English' OR language = 'Spanish') ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM language_proficiency_levels;
SELECT student_id, proficiency_level FROM language_proficiency_levels ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT country_name, continent FROM country_data WHERE continent = 'Europe';
SELECT country_name, continent FROM country_data ORDER BY country_name;
SELECT student_id, language_code, proficiency_level FROM language_proficiency_levels WHERE proficiency_level > 3;
SELECT student_id, language_code, proficiency_level, country_code FROM language_proficiency_levels;
SELECT language_code, proficiency_level, student_id, country_code FROM language_proficiency_levels;
SELECT country_name, continent, country_code FROM country_data;
SELECT country_code, country_name, continent FROM country_data;
SELECT proficiency_level, student_id, country_code, language_code FROM language_proficiency_levels;
SELECT * FROM language_proficiency;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM student_info WHERE age > 20;
SELECT country, language, proficiency_level FROM language_proficiency WHERE proficiency_level >= 3 ORDER BY proficiency_level DESC;
SELECT student_id, nationality FROM student_info WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM program_customization WHERE program_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM language_proficiency;
SELECT student_id, country, language FROM language_proficiency ORDER BY proficiency_level DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, nationality FROM student_info WHERE age > 25;
SELECT * FROM program_customization WHERE program_status = 'active';
SELECT student_id, country, language, proficiency_level FROM language_proficiency INNER JOIN student_info ON language_proficiency.student_id = student_info.student_id;
SELECT * FROM student;
SELECT id, name FROM student WHERE proficiency_level='Intermediate';
SELECT country_name FROM country WHERE id=1;
SELECT name, language_name FROM student JOIN student_languages ON student.id=student_languages.student_id JOIN language ON student_languages.language_id=language.id;
SELECT * FROM language WHERE language_name LIKE '%Java%';
SELECT * FROM country ORDER BY country_name DESC;

SELECT student.name, language.language_name FROM student INNER JOIN student_languages ON student.id = student_languages.student_id INNER JOIN language ON student_languages.language_id = language.id WHERE student.proficiency_level='Advanced';
SELECT country.country_name, COUNT(student.id) AS student_count FROM country LEFT JOIN student ON country.id = student.country_id GROUP BY country.country_name;

SELECT student.name, language.language_name FROM student INNER JOIN student_languages ON student.id = student_languages.student_id INNER JOIN language ON student_languages.language_id = language.id WHERE student.proficiency_level='Beginner' OR student.proficiency_level='Intermediate';

SELECT country.country_name, student.name, language.language_name FROM country JOIN student ON country.id = student.country_id JOIN student_languages ON student.id = student_languages.student_id JOIN language ON student_languages.language_id = language.id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, country FROM Students WHERE proficiency_level > 5;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT student_name, language, proficiency_level FROM Students ORDER BY proficiency_level DESC;
SELECT student_name, country, language, level_name FROM Students JOIN StudentProgress ON Students.student_id = StudentProgress.student_id;
SELECT student_name, country FROM Students WHERE proficiency_level > 3;
SELECT country_name FROM Countries ORDER BY country_name DESC;

SELECT student_name, language_name, level_name FROM Students INNER JOIN StudentProgress ON Students.student_id = StudentProgress.student_id INNER JOIN Languages ON StudentProgress.language_id = Languages.language_id INNER JOIN ProficiencyLevels ON StudentProgress.level_id = ProficiencyLevels.level_id WHERE Students.country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress WHERE progress_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_name, description FROM Students LEFT JOIN ProficiencyLevels ON Students.proficiency_level = ProficiencyLevels.level_id;
